group_1.textCenter: Yachiyo...I can't... All this magic is@too...!

group_1.textRight: Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: Touka!

group_1.textRight: I'll take a little bit of magic from this@spear and convert it into your magic!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you. That made a huge difference!
It all ends here.

group_1.textRight: Pull the trigger, Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
Walpurgisnacht is trying to attack!

group_1.textRight: She's trying to burn us up before we can @fire the arrow.

group_1.textLeft: Still, we have to endure!

group_1.textRight: Right. If we fall apart here, it's over!

group_1.textLeft: It's my turn!

group_1.textRight: Homura! Please, help Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: I will!
Everything's...frozen...

group_1.textRight: You'll be able to keep moving as long as I'm@touching you. Now's your chance!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Homura!

group_1.textRight: I'm the one...who should be thanking you!

group_1.textLeft: *Inhale*

group_1.narration: — Iroha —@The sky cleared... Did we beat her?
— Iroha —@Did we beat Walpurgisnacht?
— Yachiyo —@We did.
— Yachiyo —@With all our powers together, along@with all our hopes as Magical Girls...
— Iroha —@Thank goodness...@I wonder what was with those feathers...
— Touka —@They were a complete enigma to me, too.
― Ui ―@Could it have been something@even Kyubey didn't know?
— Touka —@Yes, possibly.
— Iroha —@*Sigh* Still...
— Iroha —@Ui is safe, so we can finally, finally rest.
― Homura ―@...
― Homura ―@(At last, I managed to get past@the battle with Walpurgisnacht.)
― Homura ―@(I've finally crossed the finish line,@after too many attempts to count.)
― Homura ―@Madoka...
— Madoka —@We did it, Homura.
— Madoka —@It's sad that Kamihama had@to get damaged like this...
— Madoka —@But we defeated Walpurgisnacht,@so no more people will suffer.
— Madoka —@Isn't that right?
― Homura ―@Yes, you're right.
― Homura ―@No more suffering...for me, for you...
― Homura ―@Or for anyone else.
— Madoka —@Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: Geeze, I still feel like I'm stuck in a@dream or something!

group_1.textRight: We nearly died before beatin' it. A buncha@times, too.
If you're gonna dismiss all that work as@a dream, then I'm out.

group_1.textCenter: Oh, but look here!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Mami?!

group_1.textRight: Whoa, don't just grab our hands like that!@You're gross.

group_1.textCenter: You feel warm...
There, that's proof that we're alive. This@isn't a dream.

group_1.textRight: Heh! What's with you?

group_1.narration: *Grumble* *Gurgle*

group_1.textRight: Oh.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Now that the danger's past, your@stomach's alive and well. More proof.

group_1.textRight: What, like I can help it?! I'm starvin'.

group_1.textLeft: We should cook up something nice and@easy when we get back to Mikazuki Villa!

group_1.textCenter: I'd rather take a nice, hot bath...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I want to have my bath and then go@straight to bed so I can sleep.

group_1.textLeft: Heh, comments like that are just more proof@we're all still alive and breathin'.
You two did great.

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Sadly, I can't even think about relaxing@right now.

group_1.textLeft: Don't overdo it, Mitama.

group_1.textRight: I still have lots of work to do!
There's injured girls back at my shop.
That's right...this still isn't completely@over.

group_1.textLeft: We must go to the Coordinator's shop at@once.

group_1.textRight: We need to help Nemu, too...

group_1.textCenter: Yes. We'll do whatever we can for her.

group_1.textLeft: Of course...
We promised all four of us would go to all @the places on our map of Kamihama.
Yachiyo, we'll meet you at Mikazuki Villa@later.

group_1.textRight: No, I'm going too. I want to check on Mifuyu.

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo... You knew what happened to her?!

group_1.textRight: I have a good sense for the kind of things@she would do.

group_1.textLeft: Then let's all go to the Coordinator's!
Someone needs to let everyone else know.
I'll go tell them now!

group_1.textCenter: Oh, I'll help!

group_1.textRight: And me!

group_1.textLeft: All right, let's go to the Coordinator's,@okay Ui?

group_1.textRight: Oh, uh, okay.

group_1.textLeft: Is something wrong?

group_1.textRight: It just...feels kind of strange.

group_1.textLeft: Strange?

group_1.textRight: I feel like I already know everyone.
Yachiyo, Tsuruno, Felicia, Sana...
Everyone at Mikazuki Villa.
And I know everyone on Momoko's team, too,@and Mitama...

group_1.textLeft: How could that be?

group_1.textRight: I think...someone gave me that knowledge.

group_1.textLeft: Gave it to you?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
I think that Lil' Kyubey gave me all its@memories with everybody.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe it's like what it gave to me.

group_1.textRight: It gave you something too, Sis?

group_1.textLeft: It's hard to say for sure.
But you know how userName gave you back@your memories?
Maybe that was its goal from the start...and@that's why it made me remember you.

group_1.textRight: Really?

group_1.textLeft: I dunno... I guess we'd have to ask it to@know for sure.

group_1.textCenter: That's right... userName sacrificed itself@too.
But it's still alive somewhere, even if we@can't see it...
Maybe we'll get to meet again someday,@userName.
Irohaaa! Uiii!
It's almost time for our plane, you know?
Hurry and get ready!

group_1.textLeft: Okay!
You didn't forget anything, did you, Ui?

group_1.textRight: Let's see... Toothbrush, check. Textbooks,@check... Yes, it's all here!

group_1.textLeft: Then let's go!

group_1.textRight: Come on! Let's go!

group_1.textCenter: Oh, right! Sorry! Coming!

group_1.textLeft: Don't forget our souvenirs!

group_1.textCenter: Of course! You can count on us to get@something really amazing!
Oh yeah, Iroha, tell Yachiyo thanks for me.

group_1.textLeft: I will.

group_1.textRight: We'll call you once we arrive, okay?

group_1.textCenter: See you when we get back!

group_1.textLeft: Have a great time!

group_1.textRight: It's kind of funny...
They said that we've been living together@at Mikazuki Villa from the start.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Yachiyo was shocked when she@heard about it too.

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo! We're here!

group_1.textLeft: Welcome back.
Great to see ya again, Iroha!
We get to be roommates all over again!

group_1.textRight: YOU don't have a room here, Tsuruno.

group_1.textLeft: Grngh! Listen, my heart lives here! That's@what counts!
Did you both get to rest up at home?

group_1.textRight: We did! But I actually missed Mikazuki Villa@a lot.
U-um, th-thank you for letting me stay!

group_1.textLeft: We're glad to have you.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: What is it, Ui?

group_1.textRight: It's just as I thought! I know this place...

group_1.textLeft: Then we must've been right about the@memories you received.
They were memories from userName...

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: There's one last person living here who you@need to say hello to.

group_1.textRight: One more person...? Oh, is she here?

group_1.textLeft: It's been a while, Iroha.

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu! You look like you're doing well...@I'm so glad!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, all thanks to you.

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu...
S-sorry, I can't...
I meant to steel myself before coming to@visit her, but seeing her like this...
Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: Iroha... I wanted to invite her back to the@Villa.
I wanted Mifuyu to come back and live with@us again...
*Whimper* *Sob*

group_1.textRight: (They finally found each other again, and @then this...)
(Yachiyo fought so hard to get her back.@This is too horrible...)
(Even after Mifuyu finally returned to @us...)
(I don't want to see them...see them so @sad...)
Can't we do anything to help her?
I never would've believed my healing powers@could fix a Soul Gem...

group_1.textLeft: But just look at how I'm thriving now, all@because of your magic!
Thank you so much.

group_1.textRight: I-it's a bit embarrassing to get thanked so@many times...

group_1.textCenter: Comin' through!

group_1.textRight: Momoko!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, the gang's all here!

group_1.textCenter: Whoa... It looks like a "standing room@only" party in here.
This place is pretty old, isn't it? Are the@floorboards gonna hold up under all of us?

group_1.textRight: Renaaa! You can't say that!
You're not wrong, but that doesn't mean you@can say it out loud!

group_1.textLeft: Kaede, you're basically saying the same thing@she did.

group_1.textCenter: Yeah, yeah. My ancient, crumbling house might@fall to pieces under our feet at any second.
All the more reason to get going, right?

group_1.textLeft: I'm here, Yachiyo.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]And so is your favorite Coordinator! I took@the day off!

group_1.textCenter: Look. Now there's more people. Let's get@going!

group_1.textLeft: I heard from Madoka earlier, too.
We should store our stuff away and get@ourselves ready!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!

group_1.textCenter: There you are! Caught you!

group_1.textRight: Oof! I TOLD ya already, didn't I?! I'm not@goin', and that's final!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, please! This isn't the sort of thing@where we can tell you what happened later!
Yeah!
Today's the day the Magius explain everything@that was going on.
It's a super important occasion.

group_1.textRight: Now YOU'RE lecturin' me?

group_1.textLeft: Iroha just texted me! We have to go now.

group_1.textRight: Uggghhh, fine! I'll go, I'll go... Geeze...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Everyone's gathering at the beachfront park@in Minaginagi Ward.

group_1.textLeft: The same place we beat Walpurgisnacht!

group_1.textRight: That's right.
They'll tell us the whole story...right where@our battle ended.
Hmm... We got here much earlier than I @expected.

group_1.textLeft: Awww, and the whole reason I wanted to come@early was to see Ui...
Oh, by the way, I'm not a Magius anymore,@remember?
There's no need to be all stuffy and proper@around me now.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
W-well, I suppose you are right... Er, I@mean, yeah! Got it!

group_1.textLeft: Much better, Tsukasa.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101901:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Err...
Can we just keep things how they've always@been between us? I'm kind of uncomfortable…

group_1.textCenter: I don't think it necessary to completely@alter our dynamic.

group_1.textLeft: Would that be all right with you, Tsukuyo?

group_1.textRight: [chara:101801:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Uuugh...
It is precisely as you say.
I think to do so would be a great source of@anxiety for us...

group_1.textLeft: Nemu! Tsukuyo! Long time no see!

group_1.textCenter: It's good to see you too, Touka.

group_1.textRight: I am a little worn out after pushing the@wheelchair all this way...

group_1.textLeft: You still can't walk?

group_1.textCenter: When I think about everything I did before I@regained my memories, it feels like karma.
My body was not in good shape to begin with.
If this is the price I must pay for peeling@away at my own soul, I'll gladly accept it.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
Oh! Iroha and the others aren't here yet.

group_1.textRight: I didn't think we'd be the ones to show up@first.

group_1.textLeft: Well, their group is pretty big and @excitable.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I guess it'll probably feel like a bit@of a field trip rounding everyone up.

group_1.textLeft: Mami...

group_1.textRight: Touka.

group_1.textLeft: I'm so sorry...

group_1.textRight: It's all right. I already heard all about it.
And besides... It was my own weak will that@invited that Uwasa to take root.
I actually think we both helped each other@to grow as people, in a way.
If we can work together after what happened,@we can grow even stronger.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.5][chara:100701:lipSynch_1][chara:100701:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_102005/vo_full_102005-14-124]Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Iroha's little sister is coming here too,@isn't she?

group_1.textLeft: That's what I heard. Ui should be here too.

group_1.textRight: Ui...
You know, she was the girl who first told me@to come to Kamihama, back in Mitakihara.

group_1.textLeft: I see...
We broadcasted all kinds of images of girls@over the radio waves.
It may have been one of them.

group_1.textRight: Then it was you...

group_1.textLeft: Yes. It was one of the things we put in @motion.
That doesn't explain how Ui showed up in the@broadcast, though...
Maybe it was her soul that was inside Eve...
Or her existence that was inside Kyubey that@somehow affected it?

group_1.textCenter: What a coincidence, look who's here.

group_1.textRight: Touka! Nemu!
Hi guys! I brought Ui along!
Nemu, your legs...

group_1.textLeft: That story's already reached its conclusion.@Don't worry about it.
I am perfectly satisfied with my body as is.
Iroha... Lots of people are going to show@up now, aren't they?

group_1.textRight: Yes. I think every Magical Girl involved in@that battle will come...
When they do, they'll want to hear about the@[textBlue:Rumors], the Magius, and their goals.
You and Nemu will have to explain everything@to them.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, we are prepared to explain everything.

group_1.textCenter: We're also emotionally prepared.

group_1.narration: A record that continues its transformation, @centering on Kamihama and its Magical Girls.
A record that popped into existence before@me, a being who should've known all pasts@and futures, every angle of every universe.
A universe where Witches remain.@A universe that may break if I touch it.
The slightest caress of a finger@could rip it apart with a bang.
But still, I wished to leave one record@where one potential version of myself@could live on, alongside Homura.
So I chose to let a rain of feathers fall.
But that's the last time I interfere.
I intended to empower them so I wouldn't@need to touch the record directly...
But even that small action seemed@as if it would warp the record.
So from now on, I'll simply watch over them.
The girl I once was, and Homura...
And Iroha, the girl who first set this @transformation into motion.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad everyone understood our situation...@But their reactions were brutal.

group_1.textLeft: We summoned Walpurgisnacht and raised Eve.
It's our fault that the city's in such@a state now.
It would be fair for everyone to hold us in@total contempt...

group_1.textCenter: I'm just as much to blame for destroying@the city...
I still can't understand how I could do@such horrible things...

group_1.textRight: I know you remember doing all that, but it@wasn't your own will.
You shouldn't feel guilty about it.

group_1.textLeft: That's right!
Don't you worry about it, Ui!

group_1.textCenter: Nemu, Touka...
I agree with them, Ui.
We should really be focusing on the future,@and what we can do to help out.
Everyone heard us out about the Magius's@goals and the fates we bear...
They understand what's going on now.
So now, we need to focus on how to avoid@repeating the mistakes we made back then.
First, we need to put our heads together and@think about how we want to live our lives.
That's one way we can take responsibility@for what that battle brought about.

group_1.textLeft: Those are questions to which an answer @hasn't been found for eons.

group_1.textCenter: Oh, but...
I think our current situation is really@special, so maybe we can do it...
So many Magical Girls are aware of the@same secret now...
I don't think that's ever happened before.
We can't let this amazing opportunity go to@waste, so let's think it all through.
The fates we have to bear as payment for our@wishes.
The liberation we once sought...
And the future we want to achieve together.

group_1.narration: Uwasa...@The Wings of the Magius...@Eve...@Walpurgisnacht...@Ui.
The road I've walked since becoming a@Magical Girl has been strewn with thorns.
I thought I saw a way out of that thorny path@but they were still coiled tight around me.
Everything that's happened so far@is a result of our fate...namely@that we will become Witches.
But now, at last, we're all finally on the@same page. We know the same things.@And we worry over the same concerns.
This marks the beginning of a new story@for all of us, starting from the same place,@working towards liberation. I'm sure of it.
If I wished for anything now,@it would be this:
I want everyone to walk the same path so@there'll be peace among all Magical Girls.

group_1.textCenter: After all this time...here we are.

group_1.textRight: Our last task is to extend our greetings to@the Eternal Sakura.

group_1.textCenter: We finally made it here as a team of four.

group_1.textLeft: I never thought this day would actually come.

group_1.textRight: Oh!

group_1.textLeft: ｜All four of you are here...at last.｜
｜Congratulations.｜
｜Now you can enjoy the city together as@good friends should.｜
｜I know there are many things that you have@resented, because you could not do them.｜

group_1.textRight: Indeed, Uwasa of the Eternal Sakura.
We certainly intend to have a good time@doing all the things we couldn't until now.
All four of us...including my sister.
While atoning for all our sins.

group_1.textLeft: ｜I welcome you to do so.｜
｜One more thing... How about letting the@little one join the group?｜
｜It has been watching you for a while.｜

group_1.textRight: Little one?

group_1.textLeft: ｜Look down at your feet.｜

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Mokyu!

group_1.textRight: userName?

group_1.textLeft: Mokyukyu!

group_1.textRight: userName! You're alive!

group_2.textRight: Welcome back...and thank you so, so much.
We're so happy to have you with us!
